The safety system monitors over 200 different limits to keep the aircraft within a safe operating envelope.

articles.title: TAC Explains: A glossary of AI/ML terms in aircraft certification
articles.author: Elan Head
articles.summary: The Air Current's special report on certifying artificial intelligence/machine learning in aviation includes a list of terms from various sources. AI is the ability of a machine-based system to perform tasks associated with human intelligence. Agents are software systems that use AI to autonomously perform tasks in response to predetermined goals. An algorithm is a set of rules that defines a sequence of operations. An AI neural network is a computational algorithm that consists of connected nodes or 'neurons' that define the order in which operations are performed.

articles.title: CMU researchers find selfish traits in cutting-edge AI
articles.author: Jack Troy
articles.summary: New research from Carnegie Mellon University shows AI systems meant to mimic human reasoning have selfish tendencies. The results are yet to be peer reviewed or published, though Yuxuan Li presented them at a computer science conference in China on Monday. The researchers made AI systems play a series of games simulating social dilemmas. The ones built on human reasoning went with the cooperative option only 20% of the time, compared to 96% for their less complex counterparts. The study also ran experiments that put multiple AI models on the same team.

IBM's TrueNorth chip achieved 400 billion operations per second per watt. articles.title: Scientists Use AI To Explain The Secret Superpower Of Super-Recognizers
articles.author: Studyfinds Analysis
articles.summary: Some people are better at face recognition than others. Super-recognizers look at faces differently from the moment they first see them.
